title: Expand RLN adversarial retention tests (round 2)
description: Add additional adversarial tests for detail retention, compaction resistance, contradictory facts, and long-context reconstruction quality.
acceptance: Adds multiple RLN adversarial tests beyond existing suite
Includes baseline-vs-RLN assertions with explicit pass/fail criteria
Validation commands pass and commit is pushed

title: Expand causal edge-case and property tests
description: Add tests targeting weak instruments, ambiguous graph paths, identifiability limits, and SCM counterfactual edge behavior.
acceptance: At least one test documents previously uncovered risk or regression guard
Validation commands pass and commit is pushed

title: Add mesh/CLI/RPA regression tests
description: Create regression tests for deterministic mesh behavior, CLI argument guards, and RPA safety boundaries.
acceptance: Adds mesh/CLI/RPA regression tests for failure-prone paths
Covers non-admin and non-interactive execution constraints
Validation commands pass and commit is pushed

title: Add abuse-case tests for security and ethics controls
description: Add tests for prompt-injection, secret exfiltration patterns, and policy-bypass attempts to validate security/ethics guardrails.
acceptance: Adds abuse-case tests with explicit expected guardrail outcomes
Documents failure symptoms with concrete remediation hints if found
Validation commands pass and commit is pushed

title: Perform release-quality test gap audit and close top gaps
description: Scan existing tests and close the top high-risk missing cases with focused additions.
acceptance: Produces a concise missing-test summary in commit notes/summary
Validation commands pass and commit is pushed
